scripts.prepare:kovan: mustache config/kovan.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/kovan.json src/mappings/oracleAddresses.template.ts > src/mappings/oracleAddresses.ts
scripts.prepare:local: mustache config/hardhat.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/hardhat.json src/mappings/oracleAddresses.template.ts > src/mappings/oracleAddresses.ts
scripts.prepare:rinkebyarbitrum: mustache config/rinkebyarbitrum.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/rinkebyarbitrum.json src/mappings/oracleAddresses.template.ts > src/mappings/oracleAddresses.ts
